text: East Lynne is a 1931 American drama movie directed by Frank Lloyd and starring Ann Harding, Clive Brook, Conrad Nagel, Cecilia Loftus, Eric Mayne. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for Best Picture at the Academy Awards in 1931. It was third adaption based on the 1861 novel by Ellen Wood. ==Other websites== * Category:1931 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Frank Lloyd Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in England
title: East Lynne (1931 movie)
